subject: Best Boss in the World
body:
Heyyy Amanda!! Your birthday's coming up in August right? What day is it again?

You deserve something special for all your hard work :) What are you turning, 23?

Nick

subject: Re: Best Boss in the World
body:
Nick,

I haven't been 23 in a LONG time lol. It's August 12th! Excited to see what I have in store haha.

-Amanda
